title: How to Verify a Solution
text: If a point is a solution to a system, then it satisfies both equations.

title: Plugging in the Point
text: Let us plug in the point. $$2(3)-6(1)=0$$, $$0=0$$. The first equation is satisfied. $$3(3)-4(1)=5$$, $$5=5$$. The second equation is satisfied. The point is a solution.
